CustomField.description: represents the # of days, excluding weekends, from the Ref GL "Date Opened" to the "Training Call Complete" date
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Training_Call_Complete__c),
(today() - DATEVALUE(Date_Opened__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DATEVALUE(Date_Opened__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Training_Call_Complete__c - DATEVALUE(Date_Opened__c) - 2*( floor((Training_Call_Complete__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((DATEVALUE(Date_Opened__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: represents the # of days, excluding weekends, from the Ref GL "Date Opened" to the "Training Call Complete" date
CustomField.label: SLA Age
